name: Using GMS to Make A Asteroids Clone
name_original: Using GMS to Make A Asteroids Clone
description:
Controls on splash screen

no installation required 

In the original and most of the numerous clones have a space ship attacking you but whose not to say giant non-scary alien or two are going  to attack?

This was created when I forced my self to Use Game Maker Studio Having no Prior knowledge I Followed a Tutorial by American Lecturer Eric  Gallery who created this for his students and forced my self to code.

link to playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL-stY4qnSgrhFnKWLDSxWWu8agAX9uAOL

and  a Starting splash screen by Driftwood gaming

I could of used scratch which is easy or I could of spent a lot of time figuring out how to do this (It would of take more than a 5 days perhaps 2-3 weeks if I was not allowed to follow anything) but following a tutorial I know a bout collisions, sprites how to link it together as well as a lot of things the reason why this is all here is because i'm not sure if this is classed as preregistration comment whether you think it is or not.

All Artwork was created by me using Photoshop

things I Added a small event that makes the next screen appear after dying that was my doing as well as additional collisions
